remarks: Convert an operation associative law to class notation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Dec-2014.)
statement:
caovassg.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S /\ z e. S ) ) -> ( ( x F y ) F z ) = ( x F ( y F z ) ) ) $.
caovassd.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. S ) $.
caovassd.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. S ) $.
caovassd.4 $e |- ( ph -> C e. S ) $.
caovassd $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A F B ) F C ) = ( A F ( B F C ) ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d C x y z $.
$d F x y z $.
$d S x y z $.
$d ph x y z $.
$d x y z $.
$d x y z $.
$d x y z $.
$d x y z $.
$d x y z $.
$d x y z $.
